name: Rogue Stern
description:
The first game I've ever finished after two years of game development!

THE HTML VERSION IS SO SLOW DON'T PLAY IT!!!!!! (UNLESS YOU GOTTA!!!!)

Submitted to Godot Wild Jam #41

If it doesn't work on mac try running sudo xattr -rd com.apple.quarantine

Controls:

W > thrust ~ back < S

A > left ~ right < D

Q  > port ~ starboard < E

P > no particles ~ fullscreen < F

R > main menu ~ spawn wave < SPACE

TAB > shop ~ enemy choice < 1-3

I > to bring up controls < I
